events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I am very disappointed.
The system has classified this case as a refund request due to the customer's expressed dissatisfaction and refund mention.
Your case has been assigned to one of our customer support agents who will assist you with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is still unused and in its original packaging?
Yes, the order number is 123456789, and the jacket is still unused with all tags attached and in the original box.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate the refund process for you. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label attached to your original package.
Thanks for your quick response and the prepaid label option. I will send the jacket back tomorrow.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support, and we hope to serve you better in the future.
